task.title: Upload Media to a Folder Using the Livefyre Mobile App
task.shortdesc: Upload media to a Folder to easily store content for future use.

context.p: You can upload photos from your device while at an event and save them to a Folder so another team member can select the best photo to publish.

step.cmd: Log in to the Livefyre mobile app.
Select media from your mobile device or use your camera to create new media to upload.
